statements: DELETE FROM medical_device_events WHERE device_id = 3 AND event_type = 'Maintenance';
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE id = 100 AND device_id = 1;
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE status = 'Pending' AND recipient = 'admin@example.com';
DELETE FROM notification_logs WHERE notification_type = 'Urgent' AND recipient_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'mobile' AND manufacturer = 'Apple';
DELETE FROM CriticalEvents WHERE event_id = 100 AND severity_level > 3;
DELETE FROM Notifications WHERE notification_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND notification_status = TRUE;
